review: Fire Stick (or Fire TV Stick?) was relatively easy to install and offers the promise of easily spending a lot of money on entertainment. It seems easy to use, at least to page through offerings, but has one REALLY GLARING OMISSION. The is essentially NO documentation on how to use the device. I have had to solve several problems (like initially having no audio) by searching the internet or asking someone who has one of the things. Yes, I will keep it and, I assume, eventually learn the tricks of using it. But it would have been really nice to find some fundamental clues to how the thing works to accomplish different tasks.
